summary.para: Specifies output stream arguments for the output passed to .
A structure specifying the format of the output resources.
A value that specifies the colorspace for the video processor output surface.
A value from the enumeration specifying the alpha fill mode for data that the video processor writes to the render target.
The zero-based index of an input stream. This parameter is used if AlphaFillMode is . Otherwise, the parameter is ignored.

The video processor uses the background color to fill areas of the target rectangle that do not contain a video image. Areas outside the target rectangle are not affected. The meaning of the values are specified by the ColorSpace parameter.

| BackgroundColor | YCbCrA | RGBA | |-------------------|----------|---------| | BackgroundColor[0]| Y | R | | BackgroundColor[1]| Cb | G | | BackgroundColor[2]| Cr | B | | BackgroundColor[3]| A | A |
A structure specifying the frame rate of the output video stream.
If TRUE, stereo output is enabled. Otherwise, the video processor produces mono video frames.
